full_summary:
<Title>
Tripp Lite Rack Consoles and Cables for Fisheries and Oceans Canada Tender Announcement

</Title>

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Gisin Code**: *N7025405*
*   **Gisin Description (Eng)**: LOCAL AREA NETWORKS, SYSTEMS AND COMPONENTS
*   **Gisin Description (French)**: Réseaux locaux, systèmes et composants
*   **Contract Title**: Tripp Lite Rack Consoles and Cables (Or Equivalent) for Fisheries and Oceans Canada
*   **Contracting Authority**: Shared Services Canada
*   **Contract Value**: To Be Determined

**Tender Evaluation**
--------------------

*   **Notice Type (Eng)**: Request for Proposal
*   **Notice Type (French)**: Demande de Proposition
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Bidder Selection Criteria**: To Be Determined
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tender Timeline**
--------------------

*   **Publication Date**: February 26, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: March 6, 2024, at 14:00 EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: To Be Determined
*   **Expected Contract End Date**:  To Be Determined

**Delivery**
-------------

*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

**Bid Submissions**
------------------

*   **Bid Submission Method**: Electronic Submissions only (via Contracting Authority’s Email)
*   **Document Submission Language**: English or French
*   **Bid Attachment**: Available on Shared Services Canada website (https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/F9448F14-1FFD-480F-AD07-3113895C25DF)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Raiyane Benchekroun
*   **Email**: [raiyane.benchekroun](mailto:raiyane.benchekroun)
*   **Phone**: (613) 324-4061
*   **Fax**: (613) 960-6007

Note: Although the original text contained more details, we have removed the notice URL and ftp URL and limited the word count to 400.
